description_en: Everything about Claude Code — the AI-powered CLI for agentic software development, including Skills, Agent Teams, persistent memory, and IDE integrations.
description_zh: 关于 Claude Code 的一切——AI 驱动的命令行工具，涵盖 Skills、Agent Teams、持久化记忆和 IDE 集成。

description_en: Deep dives into Claude Opus 4.6 — Anthropic's most capable model, covering the 1M token context window, Compaction API, benchmarks, and developer experience.
description_zh: 深入解读 Claude Opus 4.6——Anthropic 最强模型，涵盖百万 token 上下文窗口、Compaction API、基准测试和开发体验。

description_en: Analysis and comparisons of OpenAI's GPT-5.3 Codex — SWE-bench Pro performance, developer experience, and how it stacks up against Claude and Gemini.
description_zh: OpenAI GPT-5.3 Codex 深度解读——SWE-bench Pro 表现、开发体验、与 Claude 和 Gemini 的对比分析。

description_en: The rise of AI agents — multi-agent architectures, agent teams, function calling, chain-of-thought reasoning, and practical agentic workflows.
description_zh: AI 智能体的崛起——多智能体架构、Agent Teams、函数调用、思维链推理和实用化工作流。

description_en: Head-to-head comparisons of leading AI models — Claude vs GPT vs Gemini, benchmark analysis, pricing, and developer experience showdowns.
description_zh: 主流 AI 模型正面对比——Claude vs GPT vs Gemini，基准测试分析、定价和开发体验全方位比较。

description_en: The best AI coding tools for developers — from Cursor and GitHub Copilot to Claude Code and Gemini Code Assist, plus how to integrate them into your workflow.
description_zh: 开发者最佳 AI 编程工具——从 Cursor、GitHub Copilot 到 Claude Code、Gemini Code Assist，以及如何整合到你的工作流中。

description_en: Understanding context windows, token limits, RAG, and persistent memory — how AI models manage and extend their working memory for complex tasks.
description_zh: 理解上下文窗口、token 限制、RAG 和持久化记忆——AI 模型如何管理和扩展工作记忆以应对复杂任务。

description_en: Creating videos with AI — using Remotion with Claude Code Skills for programmatic video generation and automated content pipelines.
description_zh: 用 AI 制作视频——使用 Remotion 和 Claude Code Skills 实现程序化视频生成和自动化内容管线。
